data.actual_result: Textbox gets cleared and everything you did at step 5 is lost
data.expected_result: You should be able to continue editing your messsage
data.short_description: When editing a message right after jumping to a message, pressing Home button and returning back to Discord erases the textbox
data.steps_to_repro: - Send a message - Tap the manifying glass - Search for the message you just sent and jump to it. Note that it works for any messages, even an older one. As long as you jump to something - Long press your message and Edit it - You can start editing your message, don't send it yet - Press the Home button of your device  - Go back to Discord using the icon in your homescreen (not from Recent Apps or it won't work)
